short_summary: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Sensitive Compartmented Information Facility Doors to Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
================================

### Tender Announcement
* **Title (English/French)**: Sensitive Compartmented Information Facility Doors / Portes pour un local isolé qui contient de l'information sensible
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: WS4476172613-Doc4476378024
* **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: WS4476172613

### Tender Details
* **Publication Date**: April 16, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 30, 2024, at 1400 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2024
* **Project Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Project Description
Canada is seeking offers from qualified Offerors to provide sensitive compartmented information facility doors to the Department of National Defence (DND). Interested Offerors can access the tender documentation and expression of interest (EOI) through Ariba’s Contract Management System at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19407137?extsite=MTk0MDcxMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19407137?extsite=MTk0MDcxMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Project Location
* Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity Information
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Point of Contact
* Julie Simms (elle-la / she-her) PSPC TPSGC
* Email: [julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Trade Agreements
* Canada will consider tender submissions from Offerors that meet the requirements of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and/or the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Submission Requirements
Qualified Offerors are invited to submit their offers electronically through Ariba’s Contract Management System by the closing date of April 30, 2024. Late submissions will not be accepted.

### Disclaimer
The Government of Canada
